feed.title: FitTrackee Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for FitTrackee: v0.9.1
entry.content:
[!NOTE] The minimum version for Python is now 3.9.2.

Features and enhancements

  • PR#709 - Display equipment in workout detail for other users depending on visibility

Bugs Fixed

  • #708 - Cannot add/update equipment description
  • PR#707 - Display user workouts only on user profile

Translations

  • PR#700 - Translations update (Chinese (Simplified Han script))
  • PR#702 - Translations update (German, Chinese (Simplified Han script))
  • PR#705 - Translations update (Polish)

Translation status: - Basque: 72% - Bulgarian: 64% - Chinese (Simplified): 100% - Czech: 47% - Dutch: 64% - English: 100% - French: 100% - Galician: 100% - German: 76% - Italian: 53% - Norwegian Bokmål: 34% - Polish: 88% - Portuguese: 63% - Russian: 40% - Spanish: 64%

Misc

  • #355 - Update SQLAlchemy to 2.x
  • #685 - replace deprecated datetime.utcnow()
  • b224e17 - tools - update ruff config

Thanks to the contributors: - @OliverPifferi - Poesty Li - Wiktor Jędrzejczak

[!NOTE] This release contains database migration (see upgrade instructions in documentation)

entry.title: New release for FitTrackee: v0.9.3
entry.content:
Features and enhancements

  • #714 - New sports: Kayaking and Canoeing
  • PR#719 - Filter workouts according to visibility in workout list
  • #722 - Statistics per day

Bugs Fixed

  • PR#725 - Workout files upload fixes, including:
  • #716 - Trouble importing tracks
  • #720 - Increase WORKER TIMEOUT
  • PR#728 - fixed docker-compose.yml

Translations

  • PR#713 - Translations update (Basque, German)
  • PR#721 - Translations update (Chinese (Simplified Han script), Galicien, German)
  • PR#726 - Translations update (German)
  • PR#729 - Translations update (Galician)

Translation status: - Basque: 81% - Bulgarian: 63% - Chinese (Simplified): 99% - Czech: 46% - Dutch: 64% - English: 100% - French: 100% - Galician: 99% - German: 85% - Italian: 52% - Norwegian Bokmål: 34% - Polish: 99% - Portuguese: 62% - Russian: 39% - Spanish: 64%

Misc

  • PR#717 - Adds YAML bug report template

Thanks to the contributors: - @erral - @LordSexy - @mbw83 - @OliverPifferi - @slackline - @Von-Birne - @xmgz - Poesty Li

[!NOTE] Note: This release contains database migration (see upgrade instructions in documentation)

entry.title: New release for FitTrackee: v0.9.4
entry.content:
Features and enhancements

  • #117 - Total data of filtered workouts
  • PR#736 - Display date with browser settings when user is unlogged
  • PR#737 - Register user with time zone detected from browser

Bugs Fixed

  • #731 - date format inconsistency in statistics
  • #739 - total duration displayed on the dashboard is incorrect

Translations

  • PR#732 - Translations update (Basque, Galician)
  • PR#734 - Translations update (Basque)
  • PR#735 - Translations update (Chinese (Simplified Han script))
  • PR#738 - Translations update (Galician, German)
  • PR#740 - Translations update (Basque)

Translation status: - Basque: 82% - Bulgarian: 63% - Chinese (Simplified): 98% - Czech: 46% - Dutch: 63% - English: 100% - French: 100% - Galician: 99% - German: 85% - Italian: 52% - Norwegian Bokmål: 33% - Polish: 98% - Portuguese: 62% - Russian: 39% - Spanish: 63%

Thanks to the contributors: - @erral - @Medformatik - @xmgz - Poesty Li

entry.title: New release for FitTrackee: v0.9.5
entry.content:
Bugs Fixed

  • #751 - Time in Analysis is not correct in overlay modal
  • #753 - the checkbox "start elevation axis at zero" has no effect
  • PR#757 - Fix tasks queue running on Python 3.13 Note: It is now possible to use Dramatiq CLI directly to run task queue workers, see documentation. A new environment (DRAMATIQ_LOG) variable has also been added.
  • PR#760 - Fix docker files
  • 1f8ca78 - delete all temporary files when exporting user data export

Translations

  • PR#745 - Translations update (Galician)
  • PR#749 - Translations update (Chinese (Simplified Han script))
  • PR#750 - Translations update (German)
  • PR#752 - Translations update (Galician)
  • PR#756 - Translations update (Galician)

Translation status: - Basque: 82% - Bulgarian: 63% - Chinese (Simplified): 100% - Czech: 46% - Dutch: 63% - English: 100% - French: 100% - Galician: 100% - German: 86% - Italian: 52% - Norwegian Bokmål: 33% - Polish: 98% - Portuguese: 62% - Russian: 39% - Spanish: 63%

Misc

  • PR#746 - email tasks refactoring

Thanks to the contributors: - @glggr - @xmgz - Poesty Li
